name: Endangered Habitat
description:
This is an ecosystem simulation.  Rabbits eat lettuces, foxes eat rabbits and bears eat foxes. When animals die because of starvation or be killed, their body dissolves over time to become a nutritious soil for lettuces to grow in. There is not a "goal" in this game, you can freely wander around, feed animals or kill them.

This  game is made for Jamination 6 and it is my first MonoGame project.

Hope you enjoy.
